text: The 1992 Winter Olympics, officially known as the XVI Olympic Winter Games, were held in 1992 in Albertville, France. These were the last Winter Games to be held in the same year as the Summer Games. They were also the first Games where the Winter Paralympics and the Winter Olympics were held at the same site. == Olympic bids == Seven cities sent a bid for the 1992 Winter Olympics. * Albertville, France (city chosen to host the Games) * Anchorage, USA * Berchtesgaden, Germany * Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy * Falun, Sweden * Lillehammer, Norway * Sofia, Bulgaria ==References== 1992 Winter Olympics
title: 1992 Winter Olympics
